item.description:
Our First Friday gathering in January will be a celebration of the life and legacy of Christopher Hitchens, a man of conviction, vision, and intelligence. His example was a patent lesson in the dignity of freethinking: do not allow others to do one's thinking; argument as a path heading toward truth; values follow from one's knowledge, and change as one's knowledge does.

As member Anirban suggests, let's meet at the Tavern, and talk about his books, discuss his debates and interviews, and raise a glass of Johnny Walker Black, saying: Many thanks, Hitch -- we'll take it from here.
item.name: A Toast to Hitchens
